SVGClipPathElementClipPathUnits.summary: The read-only clipPathUnits property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("clipPathUnits")}} attribute of a {{SVGElement("clipPath")}} element which defines the coordinate system to use for the content of the element.

blockquote.para: Note: Although this property is read-only, it is merely a container for two values you can modify, and .

SVGClipPathElementClipPathUnits.value: An representing the coordinate system. The possible values are defined in the interface:
